1 #pragma once
2 /*
3  * PID controller for the AR.Drone.
4  *
5  * For further details see Camera-Based Navigation of a Low-Cost Quadrocopter (J. Engel, J. Sturm, D. Cremers)
6  * In Proc. of the International Conference on Intelligent Robot Systems (IROS), 2012.
7  *
8  * and
9  *
10  * Accurate Figure Flying with a Quadrocopter Using Onboard Visual and Inertial Sensing (J. Engel, J. Sturm, D. Cremers)
11  * In Proc. of the Workshop on Visual Control of Mobile Robots (ViCoMoR) at the IEEE/RJS International Conference on Intelligent Robot Systems (IROS), 2012.
12  *
13  *
14  * Author: Jakob Engel <jajuengel@gmail.com>
15  *
16  */

31 struct ControlCommand
32 {
33  inline ControlCommand() {roll = pitch = yaw = gaz = 0;}
34  inline ControlCommand(double roll, double pitch, double yaw, double gaz)
35  {
36  this->roll = roll;
37  this->pitch = pitch;
38  this->yaw = yaw;
39  this->gaz = gaz;
40  }
41  double yaw, roll, pitch, gaz;
42 };
43

45 struct DronePosition
46 {
47 public:
48  double yaw;
49  TooN::Vector<3> pos;
50  inline DronePosition(TooN::Vector<3> pos, double yaw)
51  : pos(pos), yaw(yaw) {}
52  inline DronePosition(){ yaw=0; pos=TooN::makeVector(0,0,0);}
53 };
